title: Teen at Fort Riley dies in shooting
content:
FORT RILEY, KS (KCTV) -
A teenage family member at Fort Riley died of a gunshot wound about 7:30 p.m. Friday.
Fort Riley posted on their Facebook page that it was an isolated incident and there was no active shooter.
Fort Riley leaders are providing support to the affected families.
The shooting is under investigation by the Criminal Investigation Division of the United States Army.
